message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle
You're getting the short end, but it's still a decent split
You're getting greedy, I'll try to balance it out
You're not getting the better deal, take it or leave it
Back to even, no more games
You've been playing games, now it's time to pay up
You're not budging, I'll try to meet you in the middle again
Last chance, take it or leave it
You're trying to squeeze me out, I'll try to squeeze back
